prompt: A sophisticated pop-jazz backing track with acoustic guitar and a warm electric piano trading jazzy chord voicings built on ii-V-I cadences. The bass guitar and steady drums keep the same tempo and energy, but the harmony is richer and more colorful with extended chords and chromatic movement. Instrumental, no vocals.

prompt_fields.control_delta: Harmony: replace pop progression with ii-V-I jazz cadence flavor
